body_html: @pjh5 Installed by source. I've built Caffe2 from source, and libraries, headers and cmake modules are installed system wide. When invoking from my own project find_package(Caffe2 QUIET) I get the above error. Finding the libraries manually works fine. Error seems to be coming from the cmake module installed?
body_text: @pjh5 Installed by source. I've built Caffe2 from source, and libraries, headers and cmake modules are installed system wide. When invoking from my own project find_package(Caffe2 QUIET) I get the above error. Finding the libraries manually works fine. Error seems to be coming from the cmake module installed?
body: @pjh5 Installed by source. I've built Caffe2 from source, and libraries, headers and cmake modules are installed system wide. When invoking from my own project `find_package(Caffe2 QUIET)` I get the above error. Finding the libraries manually works fine. Error seems to be coming from the cmake module installed?
